remarks: An alternate proof of the Intermediate Value Theorem ~ ivth using topology.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 17-Aug-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
ivthALT $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ U e. RR ) /\ A < B /\ ( ( A [,] B ) C_ D /\ D C_ CC /\ ( F e. ( D -cn-> CC ) /\ ( F " ( A [,] B ) ) C_ RR /\ U e. ( ( F ` A ) (,) ( F ` B ) ) ) ) ) -> E. x e. ( A (,) B ) ( F ` x ) = U ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d D x $.
$d F x $.
$d U x $.
